import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Search } from './Search' import { Job } from './Job' import axios from 'axios' export const JobsContainer = () => { const [jobs, setJobs] = useState([]) useEffect(()=> { axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/jobs') .then(res => {setJobs(res.data.jobs) console.log(res.data)}) .catch(err => console.log(err)) },[]) return (

Jobs Container

{jobs?.map((job)=>{ return })}
Position Company Posting Status Favorite Notes
) }
